segments.text: I've shifted my gaze to the center-left of the kitchen now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: There are two children, involved in what looks like a clandestine operation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A boy is balanced precariously on a two-step stool in front of an open cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool itself looks incredibly unstable; its legs are splayed, almost tipping backward.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's reaching into a 'COOKIE JAR' that's clearly labeled inside the cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: One hand is inside the jar, while the other holds a plate, perhaps to catch his loot.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His body is stretched quite high, indicating the effort he's putting into this.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Next to him, a girl stands with her arm raised, palm open, eagerly awaiting a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her expectant posture shows she's a full participant in this secret mission.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's quite daring of them to attempt this with the adult so close by.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope that unstable stool doesn't give way, or there will be a big crash.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They look so pleased with themselves for their clever, mischievous plan.
segments.speaker: PAR
